model_data_base.utils.pandas_to_array¶

model_data_base.utils.pandas_to_array(pdf, x_component_fun, y_component_fun, value_fun)[source]¶

this can convert a pandas dataframe, in which information is stored linearly to a 2D presentation.

Example: you have a dataframe like:

‘bla’

x_1_y_1 10 x_2_y_1 15 x_3_y_1 7 x_1_y_2 2 x_2_y_2 0 x_3_y_2 -1

Ans it should be converted to:

1 2 3

1 10 15 7 2 2 0 -1 3

You can use: pandas_to_array(pdf, lambda index, values: index.split(‘_’)[1], lambda index, values: index.split(‘_’)[-1], lambda index, values: values.bla)
